text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump The problem is you're not a "leader. You possess no leadership skills to help the American people with Covid19. You are contributing to peoples' suffering because you are inept and couldn't lead your way out of a brown paper bag.
https://t.co/YWThFOeUtg
